panels.description: Busy state of all CPU cores together
panels.title: CPU Busy

targets.expr:
# usually this should not exist,
# but in case node-exporter adds a new value for mode, show it
sum by(mode) (rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$instance", mode!~"system|user|nice|iowait|softirq|irq|idle|steal|interrupt"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: Schedule timeslices executed by each cpu
